sentence.Network_en: My visit to India in 1986 left an indelible impression on me.
sentence.Network_cn: 1986年的印度之行给我留下了难忘的印象。

sentence.Network_en: The experience made an indelible impression on me.
sentence.Network_cn: 那次经历使我难以忘怀。

sentence.Network_en: It will remain an indelible stain on his memory.
sentence.Network_cn: 这将成为他记忆中一个不可磨灭的污点.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 15th cent. (as indeleble): from French, or from Latin indelebilis, from in- 'not' + delebilis (from delere 'efface, delete'). The ending was altered under the influence of -ible

entry.def: If you say that something leaves an indelible impression, you mean that it is very unlikely to be forgotten.

example.ex: My visit to India in 1986 left an indelible impression on me...
example.tran: 1986年的印度之行给我留下了难忘的印象。

example.ex: The war has made an indelible mark on the world.
example.tran: 战争给世人留下了不可磨灭的印记。

entry.tran: 难以去除的;洗不掉的;擦不掉的
entry.def: Indelible ink or an indelible stain cannot be removed or washed out.

example.ex: It leaves indelible stains on clothes.
example.tran: 它会在衣物上留下洗不掉的污渍。

means.word_mean: 1. cannot be removed, washed away or erased;

auth_sentence.content: It had stood in its place solid, indelible.
auth_sentence.res_content: It had stood in its place solid, indelible.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It had stood in its place solid, indelible.

auth_sentence.content: Get the lot and the memories are indelible.
auth_sentence.res_content: Get the lot and the memories are indelible.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Get the lot and the memories are indelible.

auth_sentence.content: The King...bears the indelible shame of the deed.
auth_sentence.res_content: The King...bears the indelible shame of the deed.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The King...bears the indelible shame of the deed.

means.word_mean: (墨水、钢笔等）（笔迹）无法消除的； 擦不掉的

sentences.en: The sinister atmosphere of the place left an indelible imprint on my memory.
sentences.cn: 此处不祥的氛围在我的记忆中刻下了不可磨灭的印记。
